A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a bold\, new\, satisfying installment in the Star Wars galaxy of films. I had high hopes for the movie and was not disappointed. TLJ surprised me again and again\, taking the characters and story in directions I didn't expect. After two viewings\, I'm convinced there's more to this movie than meets the eye. The complaints of some people\, in my opinion\, reflect a superficial understanding of the movie. There is a message here about heroism and hope\, love and sacrifice. I still think ESB is the best film in the whole series\, but TLJ surpasses all the prequels and at least lives up to\, and is perhaps even better than TFA.
